name: Baby Aadhya Daily Routine Activities
description:
Baby Aadhya Daily Routine Activities game is a collection of all the learning activities that we do in our day to day. This baby care game is specially designed for educational purposes with lots of fun tasks in to keep kids learning. Baby Aadhya needs your attention, can you help her? There are tons baby care activities that you perform with cute Aadhya like wash her hands & face properly, brushing, clean her nose, help her in laundry, pick her toys, give her clean bath, select the best dress up for beautiful, feed her healthy food, set the table, remove the rubbish and clean the bedroom, tell her interesting bedtime story and help her in sleeping time and much more activities. So complete each and every activity and take care that she doesn't start crying! With this game, kids learn things fast and easy with lots of fun.

Key Features:

- Learning game for kids
- 40+ different baby care activities
- Baby Aadhya with different face expressions
- Many different shampoos and 
- Use tons of cleaning tools
- Enjoy prayer
- Get Day by day report
- Easy to play so it can be played by all ages kids
- Aadhya entertain you for several hours
